title: BACK PACK
lyrics:
5 ContributorsBACK PACK Lyrics[Intro]
Ayo, can't be dressing regular when you're rocking REKKI
Truss me, what is that?
Old school Tamagotchi's
PS2's
Yeah man, throwback
Sega
Can't forget the Dragon Ball Z's
Air force 1's
DS too

[Verse 1]
Put my backpack on I'm gone
If I'm chatting to your girl, swear it's long
I'm the definition of fun
I'm high right now but I don't even bun
Tell them man they can't steal my shine
She leng and she mine I'll wine and dine
Most of them man there eyeing right
I just hop in my whip I'm flying right

[Chorus]
She B-A-D call me D-A-D (Yeah)
Some of my girls come thick baby
Sometimes I'm loving them slim baby
One thing thеy all got, they a freak baby for me
I lovе when they all wanna sing for me
Sing for me, yeah a symphony
(Ha-ha-ha, It's R-E-K-K-I when you're addressing me)
She B-A-D call me D-A-D (Hum)
Some of my girls come thick baby (Yeah)
Sometimes I'm loving them slim baby
One thing they all got, they a freak baby for me
I love when they all wanna sing for me (Yeah)
Sing for me, yeah a symphony (Yeah, yeah)
(Ayo, we need more beanies tho, throw it back, throw it back)
You might also like[Verse 2]
Back then it was bootcuts
Hood like the Ku Klux
Freak girls tryna do us
Took L's had no tutors
You wanted litness, you had to get it right through us
Feds dem tryna move us
Stop and search we saying we just some students
All my ex's knew where the food was
Rubbing their bellies touching their Fupa's
Now my hair grew longer, the cargo's flared
Push to start but wear khaki bares
I rock pieces making them stare
No we don't dress like them man there
I just need my cut my share
I got connects like Bluetooth pair (Pair)
No boundaries, I'm jumping
Come like I'm bumping the fare

[Chorus]
She B-A-D call me D-A-D (Yeah)
Some of my girls come thick baby
Sometimes I'm loving them slim baby
One thing they all got, they a freak baby for me
I love when they all wanna sing for me
Sing for me, yeah a symphony
(Ha-ha-ha, It's R-E-K-K-I when you're addressing me)
She B-A-D call me D-A-D (Hum)
Some of my girls come thick baby (Yeah)
Sometimes I'm loving them slim baby
One thing they all got, they a freak baby for me
I love when they all wanna sing for me (Yeah)
Sing for me, yeah a symphony (Yeah, yeah)
(Ayo, we need more beanies tho, throw it back, throw it back)
[Verse]
I'm skidding through ends
I'm thinking bout times it's penny up pound's from pence
17, I had no sense
I'm young just tryna' jump the fence
Rolling with friends
Still in the ends
Beanies bussin peng
Recorded my first ever song with my webcam
Used to play it back my reaction crazy, coming like Denz and Renz
Had a sock on the mic
No stand, just hands
Way before I made bands
I knew I had suttin when I would show people
And their heads kept boppin'
Feet just tapping
See the words can lie but the body don't do cappin'

[Outro]
She B-A-D call me D-A-D
Some of my girls come thick baby
Sometimes I'm loving them slim baby
One thing they all got, they a freak baby for me
I love when they all wanna sing for me
Sing for me, yeah a symphony
It's R-E-K-K-I when you're addressing meEmbed
